body.p:
Head Quarters 13th U S Infantry
Newport Barracks Ky
July 6th 1864

I have the honor to enclose herewith a Consolidated Tri Monthly report of men enlisted into the 13th Infantry (Regular Army) from the State of Kentucky from the 21st day of June 1864 to the 30th of June 1864

I am, Sir,
Very Respectfully,
Your Obdt Servant.
Ferd. E. de Courcey,
1st Lieut and Adjt 13th U S Infantry
Supt Regtl Rectg Service

To His Excellency
The Governor of the
State of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky.

13
Newport Barracks
July 6th 1864
De Courcey Ferd E.
Encloses report of number of men enlisted in Regular Army during the month of June 1864

L. B. No 5 -- 1864. P. 47
Recd A. G. O July 129 1864
